name: dark-mode-lover
description: Dark Mode Lover is a theme for Visual Studio Code, inspired by One Dark and Monokai. It offers a balanced contrast and broad language support, making it a great choice for developers who prefer dark themes.

screenshots.description: DarkMode Lover in action, showcasing its vibrant colors and balanced contrast.
DarkMode Lover's support for various programming languages, demonstrating its versatility.
